attributes.action: Reform planning regulations regarding telecommunications installations
attributes.additional_details:
c. Require removal of telecommunications installations from areas that demonstrated objection to installation or where poor/no consultation took place.

We believe the places we call home are being irrevocably damaged by the installation of 8-15m broadband poles by Alt Nets. Permitted development legislation (2015) gives Alt Nets rights to install poles without planning permission or consultation, regardless of whether an area is already well-serviced by underground infrastructure or where there is strong opposition to installation. Please stop  what we see as the unfettered corporate vandalism of our homes - we don't want your broadband poles, we want underground infrastructure.
attributes.background:
a. Remove telecommunication installations from permitted development legislation.

b. Require consultation before telecommunications installations.
